function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate sanitization procedures","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases, including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Adopting extraordinary cleaning and sanitization procedures, using appropriate disinfectants, and ensuring the removal of organic residues","Technologies":"Disinfectants based on sodium hypochlorite, ethanol, hydrogen peroxide, and ultraviolet irradiation","People":"Workers, visitors, and occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Facility management, cleaning staff, and building occupants"},{"Description":"Close contacts between work colleagues or other staff","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases through close contact","Mitigation":"Reducing direct physical contact, avoiding contact with secretions, and maintaining distance in closed environments","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Workers and staff in the built environment","Owner":"Employers and facility management"},{"Description":"Inadequate isolation room for suspicious cases","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases within the facility","Mitigation":"Identifying and preparing a suitable isolation room, ensuring cleanliness, ventilation, and proper sanitization after use","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Workers, visitors, and occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Facility management and healthcare authorities"}]}
